sentences.translation: 有体不动产是指土地本身。

sentences.sentence: This time, corporeal punishment is have to.
sentences.translation: 这个时候， 体罚是必须的。

sentences.sentence: Of course, the human body is the supreme example of the spiritually infused corporeal substance.
sentences.translation: 当然，人体是被注入了灵魂的，具体物质的最高代表。
